statements: SELECT * FROM RFID_tracking;
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM RFID_tracking;
SELECT tag_id, location FROM RFID_tracking WHERE asset_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM RFID_tracking ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT asset_id, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM RFID_tracking GROUP BY asset_id;
SELECT * FROM RFID_tracking WHERE location = 'Room 101' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, asset_id FROM RFID_tracking WHERE tag_id LIKE '%ABC%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM RFID_tracking WHERE location IN ('Room A', 'Room B') ORDER BY location, timestamp DESC
SELECT id, location FROM RFID_tracking WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY location DESC, timestamp ASC
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS last_seen, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM RFID_tracking GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, location_id, last_seen_timestamp FROM assets ORDER BY last_seen_timestamp DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, location_id FROM assets WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM assets JOIN locations ON assets.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, location_id, last_seen_timestamp FROM assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE location_id = 10 ORDER BY last_seen_timestamp DESC;
SELECT asset_name, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM assets JOIN locations ON assets.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT asset_name, asset_id, last_seen_timestamp FROM assets WHERE last_seen_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_name LIKE '%computer%' AND location_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Assets;
SELECT asset_name, last_scan_timestamp FROM Assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM Locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, location_id FROM Assets WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT scan_id, asset_id, location_id, scan_timestamp FROM AssetScans WHERE scan_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM Assets WHERE asset_id = 1
SELECT asset_name, location_id FROM Assets WHERE location_id <> 5 ORDER BY asset_name DESC
SELECT location_name, location_description FROM Locations WHERE location_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND location_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT asset_name, location_name FROM Assets JOIN Locations ON Assets.location_id = Locations.location_id WHERE location_name = 'Warehouse' AND last_scan_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT asset_id, AVG(scan_id) AS average_scan_id FROM AssetScans GROUP BY asset_id HAVING COUNT(scan_id) > 1 ORDER BY average_scan_id DESC
SELECT * FROM RFID_Tags;
SELECT tag_name, tag_location FROM RFID_Tags WHERE tag_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, asset_description FROM Assets WHERE asset_type = 'Computer';
SELECT tag_id, tag_name, asset_id, tag_location FROM RFID_Tags ORDER BY tag_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_description FROM Locations WHERE location_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT tag_id, tag_name, asset_id, tag_location FROM RFID_Tags;
SELECT * FROM Assets WHERE asset_type = 'Electronics';
SELECT location_name, location_description FROM Locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT tag_name, asset_name, tag_location, location_name FROM RFID_Tags INNER JOIN Locations ON RFID_Tags.tag_location = Locations.location_name;
SELECT tag_id, COUNT(history_id) AS num_events FROM TagHistory GROUP BY tag_id HAVING num_events > 5;
SELECT * FROM asset_locations
SELECT asset_id, location_name FROM asset_locations
SELECT asset_id, location_id, last_seen FROM asset_locations WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT asset_name, category FROM assets ORDER BY category DESC
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employees
SELECT * FROM asset_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, category FROM assets WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_timestamp FROM asset_history WHERE location_id = 2 AND event_type = 'Moved' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT tag_code FROM rfid_tags WHERE asset_id = 5 AND tag_code LIKE '%A%';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND position = 'Manager';
